StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: You look around the park, signs with what dogs may or may not do quickly catching your eyes. You quickly notice most of the signs feature man's best friend with a collar. Immediately it hits you how useful one of these might not be...
StaticSkill.Description: What's a dog lover without having at least one collar to put around their beloved pet? This spell changes something, or someone, into a pink leather belt of love and compassion... or just to put a leash on for walks
